subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Vincent Jackson had a career-high three touchdown catches, Philip Rivers surpassed 4,000 yards passing for the third straight season and San Diego beat San Francisco to stay alive in the A.F.C. West race.
snippet: Vincent Jackson had a career-high three touchdown catches, Philip Rivers surpassed 4,000 yards passing for the third straight season and San Diego beat San Francisco to stay alive in the A.F.C. West race.
